line.comment: * Add-Ons 1.2: Need to check if the destination exists!
* Player is trying to start/stop population Transfer to another station.
* Currently transferring to this outpost, so Stop.
* Open dialog requesting an outpost to transfer to.
* Herobetty: just for flavor: Xenon marines are robots, so they get a number for their name.
* Herobetty: player must not have joined the OCV in order to get the benefit. Robot marines are stronger than organic marines.
* Add-Ons 1.2: Academy legendary terraforming effect gives +5 stats to all marine stats.

sval.val: Add-Ons 1.2: Need to check if the destination exists!
Player is trying to start/stop population Transfer to another station.
Currently transferring to this outpost, so Stop.
Open dialog requesting an outpost to transfer to.
Herobetty: just for flavor: Xenon marines are robots, so they get a number for their name.
Herobetty: player must not have joined the OCV in order to get the benefit. Robot marines are stronger than organic marines.
Add-Ons 1.2: Academy legendary terraforming effect gives +5 stats to all marine stats.
